title: Foundations of Context-Based Educational Computing Environment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific theories and experience in using digital devices
context.additional_context: A program to strengthen competencies in designing digital learning environments applicable to elementary education settings, primarily composed of pre-service teachers or non-major job seekers with no educational practicum experience

learning_goals: Classify three or more technology-based learning environments according to learners' cognitive levels and the complexity of scientific concepts
Select appropriate computing tools for specific educational scenarios using a contextual analysis framework
Analyze conceptual structures in elementary science (e.g., ecosystems, physical laws) to design suitable digital learning activities
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
